short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ghauri TabSorting fetch content to new tab for the comfort of user.It has appealing background and have tabs sorting functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ghauri TabSorting sort your all tabs that is very helpful for user.It has attractive background and provide shortcut links for socializing.
This is official Ghauri TabSorting sort extension. On extension page user will get direct access to social account e.g Facebook ,YouTube , LinkedIn, and Twitter.
Also it provides eye catching background for the users as well for better and soothing experience while sorting .
By clicking " Add to Chrome" ,I accept and agree to installing the Ghauri TabSorting New Tab Search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use 
and Privacy Policy.
